sentences.english: The obtained cryptosystem modifies the class of MC public key cryptosystems.
sentences.chinese: 這種體制是一類MC公鑰密碼體制的改進。

sentences.english: A series of research has been carried out in using china clay as stuffing in MC nylon.
sentences.chinese: 對瓷土做MC尼龍填充劑進行了一系列的應用研究。

sentences.english: And an improvement has been made on an ambiguous problem in MC algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 針對MC算法存在的二義性問題進行了改進。
